title: Player support working today?
body:
I've been waiting for them to reset all my rune pages so I can actually play League.

Are they working today does anyone know?

replies.body: We're definitely here! Rest assured that our Support agents are steadily working through their tickets in the order that they came in. I was able to see yours in the queue, and they should be responding soon!

From the player support specialist:

> This fix was done as a one time exception. In the future, please do not rearrange your rune pages or name them something similar.

LOL really, **one time exception** due to a bug of your own fault? Fuck you riot (not you broporo, just riot in general).
